definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: I am David Forest from VOA news center in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 我是位於華盛頓的美國之音新聞中的戴衛。

sentences.english: It was VOA's Curation Kurt Achin reports from the South Korean Capital.

sentences.english: VOA Director Dan Austin has rejected Iran's accusations.
sentences.chinese: 美國之音臺長奧斯汀駁斥了伊朗的指責。

sentences.english: Now the VOA Special English program WORDS AND THEIR STORIES.

我是大衛得福斯，美國之音新聞。

sentences.english: It's 15:00 hours, Universal Time, and here is the news from the Voice of America.

sentences.english: You have been listening to the VOA Special English program, WORDS AND THEIR STORIES. I'm Warren Scheer.
sentences.chinese: 您已聽美國之音特別英語節目，言論和他們的故事。

sentences.english: I'm David De Forest from the VOA News Center in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 我是華盛頓美國之音新聞中心的大衛德佛瑞斯特。

sentences.english: Now, the Special English program WORDS AND THEIR STORIES.
sentences.chinese: 現在，這裏是美國之音慢速英語詞彙掌故節目。

sentences.english: Parker told VOA she would not be deterred by terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 帕克對美國之音說，她不會被恐怖主義所嚇倒。

sentences.english: The charter states that VOA has to win the attention and respect of its listeners.
sentences.chinese: 這個章程表明，美國之音必須贏得聽衆的關注和尊重。

sentences.english: Don't you listen to Powell on Voice of America radio?" the cabdriver".

sentences.english: And that's the VOA Special English Education Report, written by Nancy Steinbach. I'm Steve Ember.

sentences.english: And now Words and Their Stories -- a weekly program from VOA Learning English.

sentences.english: He tells VOA's Barry Newhouse about the dangers journalists face there.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴記者面臨的危險有美國之音的巴里豪斯。

sentences.english: Weekly Standard editor Fred Barnes is a frequent guest on VOA's Issues in the News program.
sentences.chinese: 旗幟週刊編輯巴尼斯經常是美國之音新聞節目的佳賓。
